verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I was a leper outside the city
None would come close
But You wouldn't let go
What worked back then
Will work again
I know the blood is still the blood
And I had an issue
No one could help
I tried them all
My last try I crawled
And what worked back then
Will work again
I know the blood is still the blood

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And oh, how precious
How beautiful
This priceless love
I've come to know
And in the midst of
My darkest storm
I know the blood is still the blood
It is, it is

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
I was just like Mary
Labeled by shame
They called my wrong
But You called my name
What worked back then
Will work again
'Cause I know the blood is still the blood
I know the blood is still the blood

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
It washes white as snow
The blood can make me whole
It paid the debt I owe
The blood has made me whole

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
He took my place
Should've been me

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Oh, how precious
How beautiful
This priceless love
I've come to know
In the midst of
My darkest storm
I know the blood is still the blood

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
I know the blood is still the blood
I know the blood is still the blood
I know the blood is still the blood
I know the blood is still the blood, oh
I know the blood is still the blood, oh
I know the blood is still the blood
